DOC.detailed_description: The study consist two group : one diagnosis depression ( diagnostic criterion DSM-IV-TR MINI International Neuropsychiatric Interview - Brazilian version 5.0 ) without diagnosis depression . Subjects depression part group 1 . They must use therapeutic dose antidepressant least 2 month intervention prescribe psychiatrist . Subjects diagnosis depression part group 2 . Subjects include study receive injection 20 U ( minimal dose ) 40 U ( maximum dose ) BTX-A ( BOTOX速/Allergan , USA ) dilute 0.9 % saline , accord standard injection 4U 5 point glabellar area treatment . Four visit schedule . Visit 0 ( baseline ) , Visit 1 ( intervention ) , visit 2 ( 4 week ) , visit 3 ( 8 week ) visit 4 ( 12 week ) . The scale assessment depressive symptom , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , apply visit 1,2,3,4 ; WHOQOL BREF apply baseline visit 4 . Rosenberg Self-Esteem Scale apply visit . Photographs take well dermatological evaluation wrinkle fold assess use 4-points validated Severity Wrinkles Scale , psychiatric evaluation well , group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female subject , age 25 60 year ; 2 . Subjects diagnose major depression accord criterion DSMIV , MINI International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI Brazilian version 5.0.0 ) ; 3 . Subjects administer therapeutic dose approve , prescribe antidepressant medication ( pattern dose literature ) , use mention medication stable therapeutic dose least three month prior randomization visit ; 4 . Subjects mild ( 1 ) , moderate ( 2 ) severe ( 3 ) glabellar frown line rest accord Severity Wrinkles Scales ; 5 . Female subject childbearing age present negative urine pregnancy test use effective contraceptive method ; 6 . Subjects never receive botulinum toxin A previously ; 7 . Subjects agree take part study , fully inform purpose nature investigation sign informed consent form ; 8 . Subjects available throughout duration study ; 9 . Subjects sufficient school awareness enable cooperate degree require protocol ; 10 . Subjects Critical appreciation preserve , attest assistant psychiatrist ( group1 ) ; 11 . Subjects reside family member assume coresponsibility study . 1 . Subjects whose medical history physical examination present clinical pathology , myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert Syndrome , neoplasm , muscular disease , motor neuron disease , systemic autoimmune neurological disease ; 2 . Subjects use amino glycoside penicillamine antibiotic , quinine Ca2+ channel blocker ; 6 . Subjects use medication , opinion investigator may cause depression , betablockers , oral corticosteroid interferon ; 7 .
